titles.title: A bill to provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of industrial nitrocellulose from the United Kingdom.
A bill to provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of industrial nitrocellulose from the United Kingdom.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Directs the U.S. Customs and Border Protection to provide for the reliquidation of, and the refund of collected excess antidumping duties (including interest) to the importer of record on, certain entries of industrial nitrocellulose from the United Kingdom.
